title: Tender  for  the  Supply  of  250,000  Vials of Rabies Vaccine (Human Use) 1 ml. x 0.5 ml.
decision_details: the proposal made by Hon. Maithripala Sirisena, Minister of Health, to award the above tender to the lowest responsive bidder for a total C&F price of US $1,250,000.00 (LKR162,670,625.00), as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (SCAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
